programme.title: Lord of the Flies
programme.desc: English schoolboys (James Aubrey, Tom Chapin, Hugh Edwards), stranded on a desert island without adults, soon turn savage.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a Latin American prison, an emotional relationship evolves between a homosexual and his cellmate, a political radical.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: The Last Emperor
programme.desc: Named Emperor of China at age 3 in 1908, Pu Yi (John Lone) becomes a prisoner of destiny.

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: Writer David Irving (Timothy Spall) wages a legal battle against historian Deborah Lipstadt (Rachel Weisz) after she accuses him of denying the Holocaust.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A genetically engineered soldier (Channing Tatum) informs an ordinary woman (Mila Kunis) of her destiny as the next recipient of an extraordinary inheritance that could alter the balance of the cosmos.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: Now a traveling mercenary, Hercules must once again become a hero to help the benevolent king of Thrace protect his people from a powerful warlord.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Mississippi Masala
programme.desc: People resent the romance of a black man (Denzel Washington) and an Indian woman (Sarita Choudhury) in a Mississippi town.

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock 'n' roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: A high school student exploring her independence on homecoming night is disrupted by her older brother and the shadows of their past.

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: A college basketball coach (Gene Hackman) leaves the Navy in 1951 and becomes coach of an underdog Indiana high-school team.

programme.title: Men's College Soccer
programme.desc: Action from men's college soccer.

programme.title: Women's College Lacrosse

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Tigers (18-5, 10-2 ACC) face the No. 2 Blue Devils (20-2, 12-0). Duke boasts the nation's longest win streak at 16 games after an 83-54 drubbing of Syracuse on Feb. 5. Clemson's six-game run ended in a triple-overtime loss Jan. 4 to Georgia Tech.

programme.title: College Baseball
programme.desc: From Doug Kingsmore Stadium in Clemson, S.C.

programme.title: College Softball

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 20 Tigers play the Panthers. Clemson remains in the mix for an ACC title shot with wins in seven of its past eight. Pittsburgh has fallen out of the College Football Playoff picture after back-to-back losses to then-No. 20 SMU and Virginia.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Mustangs (11-1) and No. 17 Tigers (9-3) meet for the first time, in the ACC championship game. SMU went 8-0 in-conference in its first ACC campaign. Clemson plays in its 10th ACC final, losing in 2009 and winning eight from 2011 to 2022.

programme.title: College Baseball
programme.desc: Championship.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: When Indiana native Everett Case arrives in Raleigh to become the coach at North Carolina State, his vision spearheads not just the rise of college basketball at his school and in the region, but the start of a conference that will change the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: From Frank McGuire to Bones McKinney and Vic Bubas, new coaches emerge to challenge the early success of Everett Case. It all precedes a final poignant moment of triumph for Case at the only home the ACC Tournament has, until this point, ever known.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After a rough start, North Carolina's Dean Smith comes to be known for both dominance and dignity, playing a central role in desegregating the ACC with the recruitment of Charlie Scott, who emerges as a star on some of Smith's greatest teams.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: An intense and high-impact rivalry develops between Maryland and North Carolina State, capped by the finale of the 1974 ACC Tournament in arguably the greatest college basketball game ever - and a battle that helps shape the future of the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Dean Smith's North Carolina teams may be the class of the ACC, but rivals also flourish, including a Virginia team led by Wally Walker, and a Duke program that re-emerges with a championship run in 1978 and a controversial title two years later.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Virginia's Ralph Sampson earns national player of the year honors three times, but never wins the ACC Tournament. Dean Smith seeks a title with freshman Michael Jordan, and the charismatic Jim Valvano leads NC State on a memorable Cinderella run.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After previous ACC Tournament heartbreaks, Maryland's Lefty Driesell and Georgia Tech's Bobby Cremins both seek redemption. All the while, Mike Krzyzewski survives early calls for his job and helps turn up the heat on the Duke-Carolina rivalry.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: At Duke, Coach K puts together one of the most iconic teams ever with Christian Laettner, Grant Hill and Bobby Hurley. Wake Forest seeks a return to glory led by Randolph Childress and Tim Duncan, and Dean Smith's career ends in memorable fashion.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: As a new century dawns, Duke is more dominant than ever, winning seven ACC championships in eight years with a core of stars headlined by Shane Battier and Jay Williams. Roy Williams rejuvenates the Carolina program, while Clemson remains snake bit.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: The changing college sports landscape brings the conference to 15 schools, with Florida State, Miami and Notre Dame earning their first ACC championships. Tony Bennett and Zion Williamson each bring new excitement before the unimaginable happens.

programme.title: ESPN Films
programme.desc: The story of Duke basketball head coach Mike Krzyzewski and his 1982 recruiting class that, over four years, would overcome a bumpy start to change the narrative - setting its coach on a historic course.

programme.title: Coach K & Bilas: Then and Now
programme.desc: Legendary Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski reunites with former player Jay Bilas.

programme.title: Men's & Women's College Track and Field
programme.desc: From Kentner Stadium in Winston Salem, N.C.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 11 Tigers (6-1, 5-0 ACC) roar into a clash with the Cardinals (5-3, 3-2). Clemson boasts the fourth-ranked offense in FBS at 42 points per game. Clemson has won six in a row in 2024, and all eight meetings in program history with Louisville.

programme.title: Four Samosas
programme.desc: When a wanna-be rapper learns his ex-girlfriend is engaged to his rival, he teams up with three other misfits to steal her wedding diamonds and win her back.

programme.title: I Am Mortal
programme.desc: A band of rebels faces off with the status quo 200 years in the future, where humans can be genetically engineered to achieve immortality.

programme.title: God's Time
programme.desc: Two best friends race against time to stop the woman they're both in love with from committing murder.

programme.title: A Lot of Nothing
programme.desc: James and Vanessa are ostensibly the perfect married couple. Their lives spiral out of control when they decide to seek justice against a neighbor they saw commit a crime on the evening news.

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: Four friends come together for a celebratory dinner party at a country house. However, as the night progresses, dark secrets emerge and unsettling events begin to unfold around them.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Last Looks
programme.desc: An ex-cop comes out of retirement to investigate the mysterious death of drunken actor Alistair Pinch's wife. The case finds him contending with gangsters and Hollywood executives, all in pursuit of clearing Pinch's name -- or confirming his guilt.

programme.title: Bloody Axe Wound
programme.desc: In the small town of Clover Falls, Abbie Bladecut navigates the inheritance of her father's real-life slasher business.

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Muzzle

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered: A Tale of Three Letters

programme.title: Fanny: The Right to Rock

programme.title: A Minecraft Movie

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: College Basketball
